system.description:
The sound waves around you now become a lethal weapon. Using your mutated mind you now can transform them into pure energy and throw it at your foes like a bolt of lightning! When you gain this ability and at the end of a long rest roll 1d6, this is how many times you can hurl your sound bolt per day. The sound bolt deals 1d6! to any target within eyesight of you.

Max Range: 120ft.
